xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #** * Add a class *# #if("$!request.type" != "" && "$!request.className" != "") #if($request.type == 'class') ## Create the class document (if not already existing) and add the "XWiki.ClassSheet" sheet to it #set($classDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($request.className)) #if($classDoc.isNew()) #set($classObj = $classDoc.newObject('XWiki.DocumentSheetBinding')) #set($ok = $classObj.set('sheet', 'XWiki.ClassSheet')) #set($ok = $classDoc.save()) #else ##classDoc already existing : display an error message (choose another name) (% id="editorAddClassError" %)1 #end #elseif($request.type == 'sheet' && "$!request.sheetName" != "") ## Create the sheet document, add the ClassSheetBinding objetc in the class document and, if necessary, add the SheetDescriptorClass object to the object document #set($classDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($request.className)) #set($sheetReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference('', $classDoc.space, $request.sheetName)) #set($sheetDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($sheetReference)) #if($sheetDoc.isNew()) ## Sheetdoc is new : create the doc and add all the objects #if("$!request.sheetType" != "") #set($sheetObj = $sheetDoc.newObject('XWiki.SheetDescriptorClass')) #set($ok = $sheetObj.set('action', $request.sheetType)) #end #set($ok = $sheetDoc.save()) #if(!$classDoc.getObject('XWiki.ClassSheetBinding', 'sheet', $sheetDoc.name)) #set($classObj = $classDoc.newObject('XWiki.ClassSheetBinding')) #set($ok = $classObj.set('sheet', $sheetDoc.name)) #set($ok = $classDoc.save()) #end #else ##Sheetdoc already existing : display an error message (choose another name) (% id="editorAddClassError" %)1 #end #elseif($request.type == 'template') ## Create the template document and add an object of the related class to it #set($templateDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("${request.className}Template")) #if($templateDoc.isNew() || !$templateDoc.getObject($request.className)) #set($ok = $templateDoc.newObject($request.className)) #set($ok = $templateDoc.save()) #end #end #** * Remove a class *# #elseif($request.removeClass) #set($classReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference('', $request.space, $request.page)) #set($classDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($classReference)) { "delete" : [{ "space" : "$classDoc.space", "name" : "$classDoc.name" } #if($request.removeSheet) #set($sheetDocList = $services.sheet.getClassSheets($classDoc)) #foreach($sheetRef in $sheetDocList) #set($sheetDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($sheetRef)) ,{ "space" : "$sheetDoc.space", "name" : "$sheetDoc.name" } #set($ok = $sheetDoc.delete()) #end #end #if($request.removeTemplate) #set($className = $stringtool.removeEnd($classDoc.name, 'Class')) #set($classTemplateReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference($classDoc.wiki, $classDoc.space, "${className}ClassTemplate")) #if(!$xwiki.exists($classTemplateReference)) #set($classTemplateReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference($classDoc.wiki, $classDoc.space, "${className}Template")) #end #set($classTemplateDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($classTemplateReference)) #if(!$classTemplateDoc.isNew()) ,{ "space" : "$classTemplateDoc.space", "name" : "$classTemplateDoc.name" } #set($ok = $classTemplateDoc.delete()) #end #end ]} #set($ok = $classDoc.delete()) #end {{/velocity}}
